segments.text: So can we play PlayStation later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All my games are so lame , Mom . When can I get a new one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , listen , Honey , you've been a big help lately ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right on . I'm gonna get a new game !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you take out the garbage and do the dishes , I'll think about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I knew there would be a catch !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing in life is free , Son .
segments.speaker: S2
